Def.label: gatling strafe run
Def.description: Strike ship fills the air with bullets with its twin gatling guns. Covers a large area. Particularly effective against unarmored units.

Def.label: autocannon assault
Def.description: The powerful frontal autocannon can deal high damages to armored units and buildings. It does not cover a wide area though.

Def.label: gatling and rockets strafe run
Def.description: Strike ship attacks with both gatling guns and rockets. A truly devastative assault.

Def.label: incendiary bombing run
Def.description: Strike ship perform a carpet bombing on the targeted area with massive incendiary bombs. Particularly effective against stationnary installations.
